title: Device Data Cleanup
description: Remove every piece of information stored by AppBase on this device.

warning.title: Warning
warning.text: This action cannot be undone. All profiles, settings, telemetry records and active sessions will be erased.

button.label: Erase device data
button.confirm: Are you sure? This will permanently remove every local record.

status.error: We could not finish the cleanup.

details.working: Please wait while we delete databases, caches and credentials.
details.success: Re-open AppBase to start a fresh setup.
details.error: Check if other AppBase tabs are open and try again.
details.blocked: Close other AppBase panels or tabs and retry.

footer: We recommend exporting a backup before wiping your data.
